name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
AI/ML Engineer with 10+ years of experience specializing in scalable AI systems and model deployment frameworks. Expertise in **Python**, with proficiency in modern AI tools including **PyTorch**, **TensorFlow**, and frameworks like **LangChain**, **LangGraph**, **Pinecone**, **Chroma**, and **FAISS**. Skilled in building cloud-native applications on **Azure**, **AWS**, and **GCP**, with a strong focus on the design and implementation of APIs for seamless integration. Proven track record in leading projects that leverage data structures and AI/ML techniques for impactful solutions. 
Demonstrated ability to develop and deploy machine learning pipelines, utilizing tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** to enhance productivity and maintainability. Adept in the principles of microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, committed to delivering secure, compliant solutions that fulfill industry standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. Passionate about creating systems that are both innovative and effective in solving complex challenges.
